name: i love your compound eyes
description:
content warnings: bug, bird, and food discussion and images (including a close-up photo of a bee). some possibility of eyestrain due to chromatic aberration on the images.

controls: press space to begin the game. use WASD or arrow keys to progress throughout the game.

this is a love poem about a lot of things and a lot of people!

made with bitsy, using Sean S. LeBlanc and Cephalopodunk's backdrop hack, which was applied using AYolland's borksy. :)

made in about a day for the august 2022 pollinators bitsy jam.

image and audio credits:
made using the following public domain images from pexels-

  • the bee photo was taken by Egor Kamelev
  • the hummingbird photo was taken by Skyler Ewing
  • the blackberries photo was from the pixabay account on pexels, so i looked for the image on pixabay as well and this is what i found, which indicates that it's from a user named pixel2013
  • the strawberries photo was taken by Lisa Fotios
